channel.title: Colossus! The next generation of Private Servers! 742 -New Pictures-
channel.description:
Hello Moparians! Today I will be showing you my project that has been in development for several months now. Before I make a long speech 75% of you won't read, I'm just going to give you some pictures, and information at the bottom! Note that a lot of things are subject to change, and that this server is not fully "public" yet. This will be the only place I post about my server, and I'm looking for "BETA" testers. Bug catchers, I think you know what I'm saying at this point. But enjoy these pictures of these 742 Graphics ;)
[img]http://puu.sh/3EFvd[/img]
[img]http://puu.sh/3EFFr.jpg[/img]
[img]http://puu.sh/3EFUy[/img] FULLY WORKING BANK FUNCTIONS!
[img]http://puu.sh/3EG73.jpg[/img]
[img]http://puu.sh/3EIkm.jpg[/img]
[img]http://puu.sh/3EIaI.png[/img]
[img]http://puu.sh/3EGbh.jpg[/img] Fully functional Completionist Cape!
[img]http://puu.sh/3EGvC.jpg[/img] New Models, Every item usable!
Some things I will be adding pictures for later. Flasks, Excalibur (e), All bolt specs work, Swift and Brawler Gloves, Fully working Fight Caves, and Fight Kiln, Diverse PVP and a kick-ass home... 75% Dominion Tower, Fully working Nex, Nomad, God Wars, QBD, KBD, Kalphite Queen, Fully Work Corp! Glacors! Avatar of Destruction! Hati! a few new bosses to! c;
[img]http://puu.sh/3EGgN.jpg[/img] All working skills! Green = 100% Yellow = 25+%
Attack Strength Defence Ranged Prayer Magic Consitiution Crafting Mining Smithing Fishing Cooking Firemaking Woodcutting Runecrafting Dungeoneering Agility Herblore Thieving Fletching Slayer Farming Construction Hunter Summoning
Hello! If those pictures didn't pull you in, then.. I might understand. XD To be honest I really suggest you come and just make a account and test out the server. I havent put on a VPS yet but I after about a month of this BETA phase I will be purchasing one if the servers running smooth. Here is the kicker.. I'm using hamachi ATM, Verison says that they will be trying to fix the port forwarding, but until then its either Hamachi, Or wait til I buy a VPS.
Colossus will be something different than an other server. I know everyone says that, but here is what I'm telling you, Colossus will be ran by the players; In the sense that I code my own server, and I'm IRL with all the admins. That leaves no room for error in the administration, I'll be taking polls and listening to every player that puts time into make this server one of the best in all Private Servers.. I hope you will be among those players.
NOW HOW TO PLAY! Head to my website, and there are instructions there! http://colossus-server.yolasite.com/ Thanks for all your time! Sorry if this post rambled and ran on a bit but I had to type this and gather the pictures in a rush! Leave a comment, Flame me or encourage it.. all chat is accepted. Anything to make my server in a better standing c:
[url=http://colossus-server.yolasite.com/]http://colossus-server.yolasite.com/ [/url]

item.source: Colossus! The next generation of Private Servers! 742 -New Pictures-

item.title: Colossus! The next generation of Private Servers! 742 -New Pictures-
item.dc:creator: @RSPSColossus RSPSColossus
item.description:
@RSPSColossus wrote:

I mean all of this was blank as shit when I started,
I’ve started dungeoneering and rewards.
Dominion tower and rewards.
I’ve perfected Nex.
Added the four stages to QBD,
Finished up a notice board,
Made the most legit Donor Zone Ive ever seen
Fixed Agility and herblore,
Fixed Mining and smithing
Fixed the Summoning scrolls bug.
Made Jad 63 Waves,
That is just the tip of the Ice Burg,
Added a few items as well, Working on Drygores as we speak.
Its coming along, But I’m focusing on a good fundamental game before I go crazy.

Read full topic
item.source: Colossus! The next generation of Private Servers! 742 -New Pictures-

item.title: Colossus! The next generation of Private Servers! 742 -New Pictures-
item.dc:creator: @kidgoku4522 kidgoku4522

@kidgoku4522 wrote:

[quote=“RSPSColossus, post:4, topic:525206”][quote author=kidgoku4522 link=topic=643897.msg4333792#msg4333792 date=1374029373]
Looks like any other 718 but gl
[/quote]

Thank you,
I mean there is so much Ive added to the server, I plan to revise this tomorrow with more pictures :)[/quote]
Well atm i see nothing u added.

Read full topic

item.title: Colossus! The next generation of Private Servers! 742 -New Pictures-
item.dc:creator: @RSPSColossus RSPSColossus
item.description:
@RSPSColossus wrote:

Hello Moparians!
Today I will be showing you my project that has been in development for several months now.
Before I make a long speech 75% of you won’t read, I’m just going to give you some pictures, and information at the bottom!
Note that a lot of things are subject to change, and that this server is not fully “public” yet. This will be the only place I post about my server, and I’m looking for “BETA” testers. Bug catchers, I think you know what I’m saying at this point. But enjoy these pictures of these 742 Graphics


FULLY WORKING BANK FUNCTIONS!


Fully functional Completionist Cape!


New Models, Every item usable!

Some things I will be adding pictures for later.
Flasks, Excalibur (e), All bolt specs work, Swift and Brawler Gloves, Fully working Fight Caves, and Fight Kiln, Diverse PVP and a kick-ass home…
75% Dominion Tower, Fully working Nex, Nomad, God Wars, QBD, KBD, Kalphite Queen, Fully Work Corp! Glacors! Avatar of Destruction! Hati! a few new bosses to! c;


All working skills!
Green = 100%
Yellow = 25+%

Hello! If those pictures didn’t pull you in, then… I might understand. XD To be honest I really suggest you come and just make a account and test out the server.
I havent put on a VPS yet but I after about a month of this BETA phase I will be purchasing one if the servers running smooth.
Here is the kicker… I’m using hamachi ATM, Verison says that they will be trying to fix the port forwarding, but until then its either Hamachi, Or wait til I buy a VPS.

Colossus will be something different than an other server. I know everyone says that, but here is what I’m telling you, Colossus will be ran by the players; In the sense that I code my own server, and I’m IRL with all the admins. That leaves no room for error in the administration, I’ll be taking polls and listening to every player that puts time into make this server one of the best in all Private Servers… I hope you will be among those players.

NOW HOW TO PLAY!
Head to my website, and there are instructions there! http://colossus-server.yolasite.com/
Thanks for all your time!
Sorry if this post rambled and ran on a bit but I had to type this and gather the pictures in a rush!
Leave a comment, Flame me or encourage it… all chat is accepted.
Anything to make my server in a better standing c:
